description: Manage the state of the configuration version for the authentication settings for the webapp. Configuration version v1 refers to the /authSettings endpoints whereas v2 refers to the /authSettingsV2 endpoints.

commands.name: az webapp auth config-version revert
commands.summary: Reverts the configuration version of the authentication settings for the webapp from v2 to v1 (classic).
examples: az webapp auth config-version revert --name MyWebApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az webapp auth config-version show
commands.summary: Show the configuration version of the authentication settings for the webapp. Configuration version v1 refers to the /authSettings endpoints whereas v2 refers to the /authSettingsV2 endpoints.
examples: az webapp auth config-version show --name MyWebApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az webapp auth config-version upgrade
commands.summary: Upgrades the configuration version of the authentication settings for the webapp from v1 (classic) to v2.
examples: az webapp auth config-version upgrade --name MyWebApp --resource-group MyResourceGroup
